INSERT INTO lecture (ID, LEC_TITLE, LEC_CORS, LEC_PLAN, START_DT, END_DT, YEAR, GRADE, TERM, REG_ID, REG_DT, DEL_YN) VALUES (#{id}, #{lec_title}, #{lec_cors}, #{lec_plan}, #{start_dt}, #{end_dt}, #{year}, #{grade}, #{term},#{id},now(),'N')
select max(lec_no) FROM lecture
mapper.select:
SELECT a.LEC_NO, a.ID, LEC_TITLE, LEC_CORS, LEC_PLAN, START_DT, END_DT, YEAR, GRADE, TERM, REG_ID, REG_DT, DEL_YN ,(Select count(*) from lec_stdt b where a.LEC_NO = b.LEC_NO) as stdtcnt ,case when DATE_FORMAT(now(), "%y-%m-%d") < START_DT then '수강전' when DATE_FORMAT(now(), "%y-%m-%d")>END_DT then '강의완료' else if((Select count(*) from lec_stdt b where a.LEC_NO = b.LEC_NO and b.id = '${loginId}' )>0,"수강중","미수강") end as attndYn
FROM lecture a
JOIN lec_stdt b ON a.LEC_NO = b.LEC_NO and b.id = '${loginId}'
WHERE a.YEAR = ${year} AND TERM = ${term} ORDER BY LEC_NO desc LIMIT ${currentPage},${pageSize}
SELECT lec_plan FROM lecture where lec_no = ${lec_no}
SELECT lec_title FROM lecture where lec_no = ${lec_no}
SELECT group_no FROM lec_group where lec_no = ${lec_no}

SELECT LEC_BOARD_NO, LEC_NO, LEC_BOARD_PRT, TITLE, CNTN, TAG, LIKE_CNT, CNT, REG_ID, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, "%Y-%m-%d") as reg_dt, DEL_YN ,(if( (select count(*) from lec_board_like b where b.lec_board_no = a.LEC_BOARD_NO and id = '${id}' )>0,'Y','N')) as likeYn FROM lec_board a where lec_no = ${lec_no}
and LEC_BOARD_PRT = '${sortOrder1}'
AND ( title like concat('%', #{sortOrder3}, '%') OR cntn like concat('%', #{sortOrder3}, '%') OR tag like concat('%', #{sortOrder3}, '%') )
ORDER BY
LIKE_CNT desc,
LEC_BOARD_NO desc, reg_dt desc
LIMIT ${currentPage},${subPageSize}
